meta.name: Message Signatures
meta.description:
Automatically adds a signature (like in old forum posts and emails) to your messages.
Does not add it again if the last message in the chat was also yours.

signature.description: The signature to add to your messages
signature.default: -# Sent from my Samsung Smart Fridge

filterList.description: List of guild/channel/user IDs to either black or whitelist for adding a signature when sending a message, will be checked in that order.

filterType.description: Change the list to be a whitelist instead of a blacklist

sendInGuilds.description: Whether to add a signature when sending a message in a guild

sendInGroups.description: Whether to add a signature when sending a message in a group chat

sendInDMs.description: Whether to add a signature when sending a message in a private chat
